text: NGC 7004 is a spiral galaxy around 330 million light-years away from Earth in the constellation Indus. NGC 7004 has an estimated diameter of 166,980 light- years. NGC 7004 was discovered by astronomer John Herschel on October 2, 1834. NGC 7004 is also part of a group of galaxies that contains the nearby galaxy NGC 7002. == References == ==See also== * NGC 6861 * NGC 2787 * List of NGC objects (7001–7840) ==External links== * Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1834 Category:Indus (constellation) 7004 Category:Spiral galaxies 66019
title: NGC 7004
